dct_title_s: Plano de la plaza de Oran y sus castillos, con la de Mazalquivir en 1757
dct_description_sm: 1 map : color, dissected and mounted on linen; 57 x 95 cm

Scale 1:12,500 ; Map originally folded ; Oriented with north at the bottom ; Relief shown by hachures ; Label pasted on back titled 'Le Viel Oran,' with signature ; Includes birds-eye view below map, and an index across bottom of sheet identifying points on map and birds-eye view, including cultural features, plazas, buildings and military operations ; In ink at lower right: 'Imprimerie, Collet, Oran.' ; Title and index in French and Spanish ; Oran : Publisher not identified
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
